amendment.description: To require that a portion of the funds appropriated for the Global AIDS Initiative shall be made available for injection safety adn blood safety programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1993 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1993 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S13346-13347; text: CR S13347) To require that a portion of the funds appropriated for the Global AIDS Initiative shall be made available for injection safety adn blood safety programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1993 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1993 proposed by Senator Sessions.
